word_group.brief_definition: 双重血统；双重文化背景
祖先的遗产；祖宗的遗产；祖先的继承物

bilingual.source: We hope more people will protect our heritage.
bilingual.target: 我们希望更多的人保护我们的遗产。

bilingual.source: A news report about cultural heritage protection.
bilingual.target: 一篇关于文化遗产保护的新闻报道。

bilingual.source: This makes it an important cultural heritage site.
bilingual.target: 这使它成为一个重要的文化遗产地。

bilingual.source: Appreciating one's own cultural heritage is very important.
bilingual.target: 欣赏自己的文化遗产非常重要。

bilingual.source: A country's cultural heritage includes not only temples.
bilingual.target: 一个国家的文化遗产不仅包括寺庙。

bilingual.source: Appreciating the cultural heritage of other countries is very important.
bilingual.target: 欣赏其他国家的文化遗产非常重要。

bilingual.source: Cultural heritage is a lot more than just relics, you know.
bilingual.target: 你知道，文化遗产不仅仅是文物。

bilingual.source: The purpose of the concert is to raise funds for cultural heritage protection in Tongli.
bilingual.target: 音乐会的目的是为同里文化遗产保护筹集资金。

bilingual.source: Learn more about intangible cultural heritage and prepare a class presentation.
bilingual.target: 了解更多关于非物质文化遗产的信息并准备一个课堂展示。

list.abstract: Heritage（英[ˈherɪtɪdʒ]，美[ˈherɪtɪdʒ]），英语单词，名词，释义为被继承的财产；遗产；特殊的所有物。短语搭配为heritage site（遗址）。例句为“It was China's 50th world heritage site.（它是中国第50处世界遗产。）” 其复数为heritages，名词性近义词有tradition、succession、inherit、ancelegacy。

yingyinNormal.en: This heritage-listed fun park has been thrilling Aussie families since 1935.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个有趣的乐园已列为历史遗产，并且自 1935 年以来为无数澳洲家庭带来惊险刺激的体验。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh no thanks. I don't like any thing from my Scottish heritage. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，谢谢，我不喜欢任何苏格兰的东西。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: But I guess our rich heritage means nothing to you. I guess you're right. See you later.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我猜这些宝贵的回忆对你来说一文不值。你说的没错，回见。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Farkle, at least you have a heritage. I'm Riley McCheese. What could be worse than that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 起码你还有的文化传统，法尔科。我是莱丽·芝士汉堡，还有什么比这更惨的？

yingyinNormal.en: But that's all I can really tell you about my heritage right now. Because I'm still finding out who I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这就是我现在能告诉你的全部家族传统了。因为我还在努力寻找我的身份。

yingyinNormal.en: What is your heritage, Mr. Quill? My mother was from Earth. And your father? He ain't from Missouri. That's all I know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您来自何方，奎尔先生？我母亲来自地球。那您父亲呢？反正不是密苏里州的。我就知道这么多。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: valued objects and qualities such as cultural traditions, unspoiled countryside, and historic buildings that have been passed down from previous generations

examination_example.sentence: Thea van Oosten, a polymer chemist who worked for decades at the Cultural <highlight>Heritage</highlight> Agency of the Netherlands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Thea van Oosten是一位高分子化学家，曾在荷兰文化遗产局工作了几十年。

examination_example.sentence: The Eisenhower Executive Office Building commands a unique position in both the national history and the architectural <highlight>heritage</highlight> of the United States.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾森豪威尔行政大楼在美国国家历史和建筑遗产中都占有独特的地位。

examination_example.sentence: There is no reason why everyone cannot be welcomed on Mauna Kea to embrace their cultural <highlight>heritage</highlight> and to study the stars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有理由不欢迎人们去莫纳克亚山拥抱他们的文化遗产并研究星体。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: valued objects and qualities such as cultural traditions, unspoiled countryside, and historic buildings that have been passed down from previous generations

examination_example.sentence: It deterred luxury consumers who found their expensive clothing more closely associated with working-class youth culture than a prestigious <highlight>heritage</highlight> fashion house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让奢侈品消费者望而却步，他们发现自己的昂贵服装与工人阶级青年文化的联系比其与享有盛誉的传统时装屋更密切相关。

examination_example.sentence: Jean-Michel Leniaud, the president of the scientific council at the National <highlight>Heritage</highlight> Institute.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Jean-Michel Leniaud，国家遗产研究所科学委员会主席。

sense_info_list.en: property that is or may be inherited
sense_info_list.zh: 遗产; 需要继承的财产

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: valued objects and qualities such as cultural traditions; unspoiled countryside; and historic buildings that have been passed down from previous generations

examination_example.sentence: "For several years, the situation of <highlight>heritage</highlight> in Venice has been worsening, and it has now reached a dramatic situation," Tabet told UNESCO.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Tabet告诉联合国教科文组织(UNESCO)：“多年来，威尼斯的遗产状况一直在恶化，现在已经达到了惊人的境地。”

examination_example.sentence: Earlier this year, Italy signed an accord with UNESCO to establish a task force of police art detectives and archaeologists (考古学家) to protect cultural <highlight>heritage</highlight> from natural disasters and terror groups, such as ISIS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年早些时候，意大利与联合国教科文组织签署了一项正式协议，以建立一支由艺术警探和考古学家组成的特别行动组，以保护文化遗产免受自然灾害和恐怖组织(例如ISIS)的袭击。

examination_example.sentence: Or the city would be placed on another list — World <highlight>Heritage</highlight> In Danger, joining such sites as Aleppo and Palmyra, destroyed by the war in Syria.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 否则这座城市将被列入另一份濒危世界遗产名单，加入被叙利亚战争摧毁的阿勒颇和巴尔米拉的行列。

examination_example.sentence: Italy boasts more UNESCO World <highlight>Heritage</highlight> Sites than any other country in the world, granting it considerable power and influence within the organization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相比较世界上任何一个国家，意大利所拥有的联合国教科文组织(UNESCO)世界遗产最多，这使它在该组织中拥有相当大的权力和影响力。

examination_example.sentence: She says the main reason the U. N. cultural organization didn't vote to declare Venice a World <highlight>Heritage</highlight> Site In Danger is because UNESCO has become intensely politicized.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她说，联合国文化组织之所以没有投票宣布威尼斯为濒危世界遗产，是因为联合国教科文组织(UNESCO)已非常政治化。

examination_example.sentence: The former head of the UNESCO World <highlight>Heritage</highlight> Centre, which oversees <highlight>heritage</highlight> sites, is Francesco Bandarin, a Venetian who now serves as UNESCO's assistant director-general for culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 联合国教科文组织世界遗产中心(UNESCO World Heritage Centre)前负责人 Francesco Bandarin 是威尼斯人，现担任联合国教科文组织(UNESCO)文化事务助理总干事。

examination_example.sentence: UNESCO considers the entire city a World <highlight>Heritage</highlight> Site, a great honor that means Venice, at the cultural level, belongs to all of the world's people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 联合国教科文组织(UNESCO)将整个城市视为世界遗产，这是一项巨大的荣誉，这意味着威尼斯在文化层面上属于世界所有人民。

sample.mean: v. 继承；遗传而得；接手；得到；获得

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: valued objects and qualities such as cultural traditions, unspoiled countryside, and historic buildings that have been passed down from previous generations

examination_example.sentence: Living in a glare of our making, we have cut ourselves off from our evolutionary and cultural <highlight>heritage</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生活在自己创造的炫光之中，我们已经把自己与进化和文化遗产隔绝开了。

sample.mean: v. 继承；遗传而得；接手；得到；获得

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: valued objects and qualities such as cultural traditions, unspoiled countryside, and historic buildings that have been passed down from previous generations

examination_example.sentence: The guqin and its music was added to the list of the Intangible Cultural <highlight>Heritage</highlight> of Humanity (人类非物质文化遗产) in 2003.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2003年，古琴及其音乐被列入人类非物质文化遗产名录。

examination_example.sentence: Recently UNESCO (联合国教科文组织) has added Taichi to its Intangible Cultural <highlight>Heritage</highlight> List (非物质文化遗产名录).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，太极被联合国教科文组织列入非物质文化遗产名录。

examination_example.sentence: On July 17, 2016, the Shennongjia Forestry District was added to the United Nations World <highlight>Heritage</highlight> list as a natural site.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2016年7月17日，神农架林区被列入联合国世界自然遗产名录。
